mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, ESNTL_ID, (SELECT CODE_NM FROM COMTCCMMNDETAILCODE WHERE CODE_ID = 'COM012' AND CODE = A.MBER_TY_CODE AND USE_AT = 'Y') AS MBER_TY_NM FROM ( SELECT MBER_ID USER_ID, MBER_NM USER_NM, 'USR01' MBER_TY_CODE, ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNGNRLMBER UNION ALL SELECT ENTRPRS_MBER_ID USER_ID, CMPNY_NM USER_NM, 'USR02' MBER_TY_CODE, ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNENTRPRSMBER UNION ALL SELECT EMPLYR_ID USER_ID, USER_NM USER_NM, 'USR03' MBER_TY_CODE, ESNTL_ID FROM COMTNEMPLYRINFO ) A WHERE A.USER_ID LIKE CONCAT ('%', #{searchKeyword},'%')
SELECT CASE WHEN COUNT(A.AUTHOR_CODE) > 0 THEN 'true' ELSE 'false' END AS "checked" FROM COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS A WHERE A.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID = #{uniqId} AND A.AUTHOR_CODE = #{authorCode}
SELECT A.AUTHOR_CODE, A.AUTHOR_NM, #{uniqId} UNIQ_ID FROM COMTNAUTHORINFO A WHERE A.AUTHOR_CODE NOT LIKE 'IS_%'
